Rooted in the ancient yogic tradition of India, the Founder of YogaPlanet carries a living lineage received from his great-grandfather Dr. B. Padmanabha Pillai (Guruji) and nurtured through Swami RajaKrishna. A lifelong yogic practitioner and teacher with over four decades of experience, his path integrates Ha·π≠ha, RƒÅja, Karma, and Bhakti Yoga.

Alongside yoga, he has served as a Chemistry teacher in Africa and a Software Architect with a Mumbai-based pharmaceutical manufacturing group. Blending spiritual wisdom, scientific discipline, and technology, he is also the Architect and Developer of YogaPlanet‚Äîa space where classical yoga meets the modern world.
